Actions.Name: Delete envelope by id
Actions.Description: Delets an envelope identified by its id

Actions.Name: Delete document by id
Actions.Description: Deletes a document from the Verified Portal.

Actions.Name: Get user information
Actions.Description: Gets information of the currently logged in user

Actions.Name: Get company by id
Actions.Description: Gets company information by company id.

Actions.Name: Get user settings
Actions.Description: Gets a users settings by userid

Actions.Name: Get all descriptors
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all descriptors present in the current company. The list could be filtered.

Actions.Name: Get default descriptor
Actions.Description: Gets the default descriptor for envelopes

Actions.Name: Get descriptor by id
Actions.Description: Gets information of a given descriptor by its Id

Actions.Name: Get envelope by id
Actions.Description: Gets envelope details by envelope id

Actions.Name: Get all documents by envelopeid
Actions.Description: Get all documents related to a given envelope

Actions.Name: Get document by id
Actions.Description: Gets document information by its id

Actions.Name: Get files by document id
Actions.Description: Get all files connected to a given document

Actions.Name: Get file by id
Actions.Description: Gets information about a file by its id.

Actions.Name: Get file URL by id
Actions.Description: Gets the url to a file by the file id.

Actions.Name: Get all envelope recipients
Actions.Description: Gets all recipients of a given envelope

Actions.Name: Get specific recipient for an envelope
Actions.Description: Gets a specific recipient for a given envelope

Actions.Name: Get flow state by envelopeid
Actions.Description: Gets the current flow state of a given envelope

Actions.Name: Query all envelopes
Actions.Description: Queries all envelopes matching a given filter

Actions.Name: Generate security token
Actions.Description: Get's the authentication token from the Verified API.

Actions.Name: Create envelope - default
Actions.Description: Creates a new envelope using the default descriptor

Actions.Name: Create envelope - descriptor
Actions.Description: Creates an envelope based on a specific descriptor.

Actions.Name: Add document to envelope
Actions.Description: Add a new document to an existing envelope

Actions.Name: Add file to document
Actions.Description: Adds a file to a existing document

Actions.Name: Set document abort status
Actions.Description: Sets the status of a given document to aborted

Actions.Name: Generate Document from Template
Actions.Description: Generates a document from a preconfigured template.

Actions.Name: Create signature link
Actions.Description: Implementation is flow specific and may be missing for your specific flow.

Actions.Name: Add recipient to envelope
Actions.Description: Adds a recipient to a given envelope

Actions.Name: Send notification
Actions.Description: Sends a notification to recepients of a given envelope,

Actions.Name: Update envelope settings
Actions.Description: Updates Settings of a given envelope.

Actions.Name: Set envelope abort status
Actions.Description: Sets the status of a given envelope to aborted

Actions.Name: Update publish status for envelope
Actions.Description: Updates the publish status of a given envelope

Actions.Name: Update recipient by id
Actions.Description: Updates a recipient

Actions.Name: Set envelope trash status
Actions.Description: Sets the status of a given envelope to trashed
